ygData.subject: Re: Fletching question
ygData.msgSnippet: Tenin, Keep using your bow and you ll see your archery improving.  Mine went to 16 (I think I put 2-3 practice points into it) in a little over 8 hours of play
ygData.messageBody:
Tenin,

Keep using your bow and you'll see your archery improving. Mine went to 16
(I think I put 2-3 practice points into it) in a little over 8 hours of
play time. I also lucked out and found a rough hickory recurve bow (only
8g!) from the fletching shop. I have the same question about fletching
supplies -- currently the only places that I know about that sell all
pieces are in

1) Surefall Glade (I know for sure the book is available here) and
2) Kelethin

both of which are KOS for us (unless perhaps you kill a lot of gnolls in
BlackBurrow?).

Rather than resorting to a mule (I do have another character that fletches
and is a ranger of Surefall), I thought I might be able to make a business
partnership with someone who could go to either of these places. Of
course, I'd have to find someone willing to deal with such a dark soul as
myself - which might be difficult. Still, I would be very happy to hear if
anyone knows whether arrow components are available in the other dark cities.

Naela Shadowmistress of the Teir'Dal

According to the illustrious David...
<snip>
:)And still haven't gotten any
:)movement/improvement out of my Archery skill. And now looking for Fletching
:)supplies in Netrick to build my own Arrows/Bows.
:)
:)Does any one know where the book for Fletching is and/or the supplies are
:)(found some behind the mushroom inn) or do I have to go to another city,
:)hopefully evil because I am KOS anymore at Freeport, and of course the
:)vendors wouldn't talk to me anyway? Any ideas or do I have to make (don't
:)want to do this) a mule character to get the items (still can't believe they
:)didn't make the tools available to us at the bow shop). I have searched and
:)haven't found it, I will look again tonight, maybe I missed someone.
:)
:)Tenin - Tarew Marr
